#summary API reference for emo.PhysicsInfo
#labels Phase-Implementation

= emo.PhysicsInfo =

PhysicsInfo connects the world of emo-framework and Box2d together. 

== constructor(world, sprite, fixture, type) ==

world is the emo.World instance. The second and third parameter is the emo.Sprite instance and emo.physics.Fixture instance to be connected together. The type parameter is the PHYSICS_BODY_TYPE_STATIC, PHYSICS_BODY_TYPE_KINEMATIC or PHYSICS_BODY_TYPE_DYNAMIC.
